casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America v. Lewis LONGHURST, Administrator of the Estate of Lawrence Corless, Deceased. No. 1822. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Dec. 27, 1938. Dan B. Shields, U. S. Atty., of Salt Lake City, Utah, and Francis J. McGan, Atty., Department of Justice, of Butte, Mont. George A. Faust and Joseph G. Jeppson, both of Salt Lake City, Utah, for appellee.

Before LEWIS and PHILLIPS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellant.
